title: Potter's Song: Art and philosophy of Paul Soldner
creator_credit: David Hubbard, Tom Hubbard, Dick Hoffman and Crystal Productions
brief_description: Explains the work and philosophy of ceramic artist and educator, Paul Soldner. Shows him demonstrating his techniques he has developed to create his non-functional raku pottery, and discussing the changing course of his ceramic art and its relationship to the environment.
